page.title: 03A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I arrive at school at about 8.40 in my friend's car. Normally the school bus has already arrived and Julie, my friend, usually meets me from the car. At 9.00 we go into school and have registration to make sure people are there. We have an assembly. We have two songs a story and a prayer. At 9.30 we have creative writing. Then at 10.00 we do S.R.A. or Comprehension Plus. Then at 10.30 we have breaktime. After break we have maths or finish off what we were doing before break. At 12.00 we have dinner. Some have dinners, some have packed lunch like me. After lunch we do painting or craft. Then after that it is breaktime. We normally go on the climbing frame. Afterwards we play rounders then go home. We all enjoy school. It is fun.
